I rebuilt my home server from the ground up: CPU, GPU, RAM, fans, SSDs, and power supply‚Ä¶ even some "accessory lighting". This thing is now quieter, faster, and built to handle just about anything I throw at it in 2025 and hopefully beyond.

Thank you to Noctua for helping to make this server quiet!

Thank you to Patrick from Serve the Home for the CPU upgrades!

(Both Noctua and Patrick gifted items for this upgrade.)
